languages.text: "Палица "Мучитель". Штатный инструмент подавления для особо опасных преступников. Прошу вас, не сдерживайте себя".
"An Excruciator maul. A standard tool of suppression for especially dangerous criminals. I ask you not to hold back."
languages.original_text: "Палица "Мучитель". Штатный инструмент подавления для особо опасных преступников. Прошу вас, не сдерживайте себя".

traits.locale_text: "An Excruciator maul. A standard tool of suppression for especially dangerous criminals. I ask you not to hold back."
"An Excruciator maul. A standard tool of suppression for especially dangerous criminals. I ask you not to hold back."
"An Excruciator maul. A standard tool of suppression for especially dangerous criminals. I ask you not to hold back."
"An Excruciator maul. A standard tool of suppression for especially dangerous criminals. I ask you not to hold back."
"An Excruciator maul. A standard tool of suppression for especially dangerous criminals. I ask you not to hold back."

languages.text: « Une masse Excruciator. C'est un outil communément utilisé contre les criminels les plus dangereux. Je vous demande de ne pas vous retenir. »
languages.original_text: "An Excruciator maul. A standard tool of suppression for especially dangerous criminals. I ask you not to hold back."

traits.locale_text: « Une masse Excruciator. C'est un outil communément utilisé contre les criminels les plus dangereux. Je vous demande de ne pas vous retenir. »

languages.text: 「エクスクルシエイター・モールです。特に危険な犯罪者に対する標準的な抑圧用の道具です。どうか手加減しないでください」
languages.original_text: "An Excruciator maul. A standard tool of suppression for especially dangerous criminals. I ask you not to hold back."

traits.locale_text: 「エクスクルシエイター・モールです。特に危険な犯罪者に対する標準的な抑圧用の道具です。どうか手加減しないでください」

languages.text: «Una maza atroz. Una herramienta convencional de represión destinada a los peores criminales. Le ruego que no se contenga».
languages.original_text: "An Excruciator maul. A standard tool of suppression for especially dangerous criminals. I ask you not to hold back."

traits.locale_text: «Una maza atroz. Una herramienta convencional de represión destinada a los peores criminales. Le ruego que no se contenga».

languages.text: “是拷问用的战锤，这件制式武器专门用来镇压极其危险的罪犯。我请求你不要留手。”
languages.original_text: "An Excruciator maul. A standard tool of suppression for especially dangerous criminals. I ask you not to hold back."

traits.locale_text: “是拷问用的战锤，这件制式武器专门用来镇压极其危险的罪犯。我请求你不要留手。”

languages.text: "Azap çektiren tokmağı. Özellikle azılı suçluları dize getirmede kullandığımız standart gereç. Elinizi korkak alıştırmayın."
languages.original_text: "An Excruciator maul. A standard tool of suppression for especially dangerous criminals. I ask you not to hold back."

traits.locale_text: "Azap tokmağı. Özellikle azılı suçluları dize getirmek için kullandığımız standart yöntem. Elinizi korkak alıştırmayın."

languages.text: "Ein Malträtierhammer. Ein übliches Werkzeug für die Züchtigung gefährlicher Krimineller. Bitte haltet Euch nicht zurück."
languages.original_text: "An Excruciator maul. A standard tool of suppression for especially dangerous criminals. I ask you not to hold back."

traits.locale_text: "Ein Malträtierhammer. Ein übliches Werkzeug für die Züchtigung gefährlicher Krimineller. Bitte haltet Euch nicht zurück."
